trustfund:
TF030314-DANISH CTF GENERAL FY03 - (ALL
            EXCEPT SUB-SAHARAN AFRICA),TF051142-PHRD-COLOMBIA: HIGHER EDUCATION
            IMPROVING ACCESS PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The Higher Education - Improving Access
            Project aims to increase the equity, and improve the quality
            of Colombia's tertiary education system, and, to
            support a coherent, and efficient system by enhancing the
            legal, and technical framework, to consolidate the education
            quality assurance system. Through its components, it will
            improve equity in access to tertiary education a) by
            investments in student-aid (loans and grants), and, b) by
            introducing monitoring and evaluation criteria. The support
            to doctoral programs will improve the quality of
            post-graduate programs, and encourage youth to pursue
            advanced degrees. The institutional strengthening component
            will ensure a labor market monitoring program, to keep
            abreast of changing demands in labor markets, while
            institutional capacity will be built to formulate, and
            implement new policies. In addition, the higher education
            information management system (SNIES) will be improved, and
            strengthened to prod quality enhancement. Project management
            will support administrative, managerial, and financial
            project activities.
